questions.text: What Christmas story did Frasier have an issue with?
questions.explanation:
Rudolph.

	Frasier said that they made fun of Rudolph until they needed him, and they wouldn't even let him join in any reindeer games.

questions.text: Who dressed up in a pilgrim outfit?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane was really into the Thanksgiving spirit, perhaps a little too much. Of course the others made fun of her for her outfit.

questions.text: Who did Sam say he had a date with?
questions.explanation:
Wendy.

	Diane said she didn't care if Sam had another date, but then when he said he did she got upset. Then she calmed down and said they would have many holidays together once they were married.

questions.text: Where did the gang celebrate Thanksgiving?
questions.explanation:
Carla's.

	Carla agreed to host it at her house but it had to be pot luck. Carla didn't want Cliff there but reluctantly agreed to let him come.

questions.text: Who kept saying things like, "This is gonna be the best Thanksgiving ever"?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody was always the optimistic one. However, he was driving everyone else crazy because of his optimism.

questions.text: What did Carla do when Diane showed up at the gathering?
questions.correct: Shut the door in her face
questions.explanation:
Shut the door in her face.

	Diane thought she was going to a professor's house for Thanksgiving. It turned out he wanted her to work at his house, not be a guest.

Andy Hardy.

	Andy Hardy was a character played by Mickey Rooney in the late '30s and early '40s.  She was commenting on Woody's never ending happiness.

questions.text: Who didn't believe Sam had a date?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Sam said his date's sister showed up and that was why she didn't come. Diane however believed he never had a date because he was really in love with her.

questions.text: How did Carla say they'd sit?
questions.explanation:
Boy, girl, boy, girl.

	She told Cliff he could sit anywhere. Carla often made jokes implying that Cliff was not a real man.

food fight.

	The cast has said that this was their favorite episode. The first few throws of food were choreographed but after that they all just went crazy having fun while the camera rolled.
